result.eng: We'll have a drink in a pub nearby.
result.ga: Beidh deoch againn i dteach tábhairne in aice láimhe
result.orig: Beidh deoch againn i dteach tábhairne in aice láimhe
result.html: Beidh deoch againn i dteach tábhairne in aice láimheWe'll have a drink in a pub nearby.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ deoċ againn i dteaċ táḃairne in aice láiṁeWe'll have a drink in a pub nearby.

result.eng: There was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.
result.ga: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnóna
result.orig: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnóna
result.html: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnónaThere was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aġaiḋ go dtí an teaċ táḃairne um ṫráṫnónaThere was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.

result.eng: I needed a drink but the pub was closed.
result.ga: Bhí deoch uaim ach bhí an pub dúnta
result.orig: Bhí deoch uaim ach bhí an pub dúnta
result.html: Bhí deoch uaim ach bhí an pub dúntaI needed a drink but the pub was closed.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí deoċ uaim aċ ḃí an pub dúntaI needed a drink but the pub was closed.

result.eng: I was in the pub.
result.ga: Bhí mé sa phub
result.orig: Bhí mé sa phub
result.html: Bhí mé sa phubI was in the pub.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé sa ṗubI was in the pub.

result.eng: There was a big crowd in the pub last night.
result.ga: Bhí slua mór sa tábhairne aréir
result.orig: Bhí slua mór sa tábhairne aréir
result.html: Bhí slua mór sa tábhairne aréirThere was a big crowd in the pub last night.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí slua mór sa táḃairne aréirThere was a big crowd in the pub last night.

result.eng: I think you're spending too much time in the pub.
result.ga: Ceapaim go bhfuil tú ag caitheamh barraíocht ama sa teach tábhairne
result.orig: Ceapaim go bhfuil tú ag caitheamh barraíocht ama sa teach tábhairne
result.html: Ceapaim go bhfuil tú ag caitheamh barraíocht ama sa teach tábhairneI think you're spending too much time in the pub.
result.ponchtml: Ceapaim go ḃfuil tú ag caiṫeaṁ barraíoċt ama sa teaċ táḃairneI think you're spending too much time in the pub.

result.eng: I spent the night in the pub.
result.ga: Chaith mé an oíche sa teach tábhairne
result.orig: Chaith mé an oíche sa teach tábhairne
result.html: Chaith mé an oíche sa teach tábhairneI spent the night in the pub.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ mé an oíċe sa teaċ táḃairneI spent the night in the pub.

result.eng: She said the pub was closed.
result.ga: Dúirt sí go raibh an pub dúnta
result.orig: Dúirt sí go raibh an pub dúnta
result.html: Dúirt sí go raibh an pub dúntaShe said the pub was closed.
result.ponchtml: Dúirt sí go raiḃ an pub dúntaShe said the pub was closed.

result.eng: The pub is still open, thanks God.
result.ga: Tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíochas le Dia
result.orig: Tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíochas le Dia
result.html: Tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíochas le DiaThe pub is still open, thanks God.
result.ponchtml: Tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíoċas le DiaThe pub is still open, thanks God.

result.eng: I go to the pub from time to time.
result.ga: Téim go dtí an pub ó am go ham
result.orig: Téim go dtí an pub ó am go ham
result.html: Téim go dtí an pub ó am go hamI go to the pub from time to time.
result.ponchtml: Téim go dtí an pub ó am go hamI go to the pub from time to time.

result.eng: It is next to Tigh Hughes [pub].
result.ga: Tá sé in aice le Tigh Hughes
result.orig: Tá sé in aice le Tigh Hughes
result.html: Tá sé in aice le Tigh HughesIt is next to Tigh Hughes [pub].
result.ponchtml: Tá sé in aice le Tiġ HuġesIt is next to Tigh Hughes [pub].

result.eng: I always go to the Tí Neachtain pub after seeing a play.
result.ga: Téim Tí Neachtain i gcónaí tar éis dráma a fheiceáil
result.orig: Téim Tí Neachtain i gcónaí tar éis dráma a fheiceáil

result.eng: Where is that pub?

result.eng: I go to the pub on Fridays.

result.eng: Do you play snooker? No I don't. The odd game of pool in the pub, that's all.
